subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Frank Stams, Wes Pritchett and Mike Stonebreaker — the Three Amigos, as they were called — were self-described “knuckleheads” on Notre Dame’s 1988 championship team.
snippet: Frank Stams, Wes Pritchett and Mike Stonebreaker — the Three Amigos, as they were called — were self-described “knuckleheads” on Notre Dame’s 1988 championship team.
